channel.title: Comments on: Roger O’Donnell – Tiny Pieces of You

item.title: By: Roger
item.dc:creator: Roger
item.description: I will do some of the tracks for this album as GB files as well, I really like the idea of sharing your music and letting people have a go at it themselves. I think we are trying to set up a remix competition with Remix mag or somebody, should be fun ! Yes it was very cool to be on Wired.com and I just did an interview with Echoes radio show which was really nice...
item.content:encoded: I will do some of the tracks for this album as GB files as well, I really like the idea of sharing your music and letting people have a go at it themselves. I think we are trying to set up a remix competition with Remix mag or somebody, should be fun ! Yes it was very cool to be on Wired.com and I just did an interview with Echoes radio show which was really nice…

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-1552">Roger</a>.
Thanks for the update, Roger. I quite enjoyed your interview with Wired.com. I was inspired to download some of your GB packages. I'm keen to find time to play with them. Very cool of you to make them available.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Roger.

Thanks for the update, Roger. I quite enjoyed your interview with Wired.com. I was inspired to download some of your GB packages. I’m keen to find time to play with them. Very cool of you to make them available.

item.title: By: Roger
item.dc:creator: Roger
item.description: They haven't done anything with it yet, it was originally requested as a bonus track for the Japanese release but Juana used another song. Hopefully it will see the light of day sometime it took me forever !
item.content:encoded: They haven’t done anything with it yet, it was originally requested as a bonus track for the Japanese release but Juana used another song. Hopefully it will see the light of day sometime it took me forever !
